results.deck: The game Inferna is developed since three years by a small group of international programmers. It is an online MMORPG that is completely free to play, as all items will be accessible in-game.
results.name: Inferna

results.deck: Combat Force
results.description: Combat Force is a wave based zombie survival shooter where the player has to fight through harder getting zombie waves and gear himself up with better weapons over time and perks to stand a chance. Aside from that the player can also make use of some handy traps and barricades. The game has 2 playable maps and a sandbox mode to play around.
results.name: Combat Force

results.deck: Glyph
results.description:
Glyph is a platforming game in virtual reality. The character is a mechanical ball, controlled from a third person perspective. The objective of the game is to collect 3 shards to open the end portal in each level. If the player dies, the shards have to be collected again.

Each level also has multiple coins, an artifact and a relic to collect. These collectibles unlocks skins.

The levels have preset times to beat to gain bronze, silver or gold medal time for that level, giving the game a speedrunning element.

The game has a multiplayer hub. From there a game of tag against other players can be launched. In this game mode the objective is to collect 10 coins first. The catch is, that the coins only spawn for the controller of a sphere, of which there is only one. Control of the sphere is swapped when another player comes close to the controller, making the game-mode resemble a game of tag.
results.name: Glyph

results.deck: A pirate game from Ubisoft.
results.description: Set in the Indian Ocean, Skull & Bones will build on the naval combat engine from Assassin's Creed: Black Flag, and feature both solo and multiplayer gameplay. PvP game modes will incorporate some sort of season-based structure.
results.name: Skull & Bones

results.deck: Full Quiet is Retrotainment Games' third NES game funded through Kickstarter.
results.name: Full Quiet

results.deck: Stoneshard is a roguelike RPG, inspired by classics like ADOM and Rogue - with tactical gameplay, in-depth follower system and a vast, procedurally-generated open world.
results.name: Stoneshard

results.deck: Overstep is a fast-paced 3-vs-3 third-person shooter that offers refreshing gameplay by combining acrobatic movement with combat. The game is free-to-play with cosmetic in-app purchases, such as skins and custom animations for all types of movement.
results.name: Overstep
